oracle text:
2/2

Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, you may exile a banana from your hand. If you do, add one mana of any color.

Whenever you exile a banana from your hand, you may scry 1. 

Whenever you sacrifice a Banana, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. 

Flavor Text: "Peel the mystery, reveal the magic." - Banana Wizard's mantra.
